meta.@content: H-Anim skeletal structure for Level of Action (LOA) one, with diamonds at the Joint centers. LOA-1 is typical low-end real-time 3D hierarchy.
(a) "Diamonds are a girl's best friend." (b) "Gosh, it sure is chilly in here."
Still needs comments on CAESAR feature points inserted
H-Anim 1.1 specification, Appendix A: Suggested Body Dimensions and Levels of Articulation, Level of Articulation Two
need to fix HAnimHumanoid metadata form
An experimental version of X3D JSON encoding is used for this scene.  Status online at http://www.web3d.org/wiki/index.php/X3D_JSON_Encoding

@info: HANIM 1.1 Default Joint Centers, Level-Of-Articulation 1 -------------------------------------------------------- HANIM 1.1 (VRML 2.0) Author name: eMpTy (a.k.a. Matthew T. Beitler) HANIM 1.1 (VRML 2.0) Author email: beitler@graphics.cis.upenn.edu or beitler@acm.org HANIM 1.1 (VRML 2.0) Author homepage: http://www.cis.upenn.edu/~beitler HANIM 1.1 (VRML 2.0) Compliance Date: May 12, 1999 HANIM 1.1 Compliance Information: http://ece.uwaterloo.ca/~h-anim/ Construction Info (joint centers): The joint centers of this figure are based on the work of Norman Badler, director of the Center for Human Modeling and Simulation at the University of Pennsylvania. The original document which these joint centers are based on can be found at: http://www.cis.upenn.edu/~badler/anthro/89-71.ps, .pdf
